snippet: President Obama may want to look back at his predecessors’ political fortunes in their sixth year in office. Then he may want to close his eyes.
abstract: Political Memo; historical record of two-term presidents shows that Pres Obama, preparing to enter sixth year of his presidency, should not be too optimistic about his party gaining or even holding ground in midterm elections.
lead_paragraph: President Obama may want to look back at his predecessors’ political fortunes in their sixth year in office. Then he may want to close his eyes.

headline.main: When a Second-Term President Nears the Midterm Shoals
headline.print_headline: When a Second-Term President Nears the Midterm Shoals
